thread.title: Panthers terrorized by 5 a.m. fire alarm pull at Seattle hotel
thread.title_full: Panthers terrorized by 5 a.m. fire alarm pull at Seattle hotel | New York Post

author: Post Wire Report
title: Panthers terrorized by 5 a.m. fire alarm pull at Seattle hotel
text:
SEATTLE â€” The Carolina Panthers got an unexpectedly early wake-up call Sunday morning when the fire alarm went off at their downtown Seattle hotel prior to their game against the Seahawks.
The Panthers posted a statement on their website saying an alarm â€œwas pulledâ€ around 5:40 a.m. PDT, about 7Â½ hours prior to kick-off against the Seahawks. The team said players and staff were evacuated from the hotel and by 6 a.m. everyone was given clearance to return to their rooms.
A number of Panthers players tweeted about the alarm. Backup QB Derek Anderson said it was just the Panthersâ€™ floors that were disturbed by the alarm, not the entire hotel.
Just happened to be our floors only.. Guess that's just by chance lol

The irate Panthers want a thorough investigation of the shenanigans.
â€œObviously, this is an issue that directly affects our club,â€ team spokesman Steven Drummond said, according to Pro Football Talk. â€œWe will let the hotel and the League investigate.â€
The Panthers (4-0) are trying to reach 5-0 for the second time in franchise history.
